name: Maidens of the sky
description:
A story based side scrolling bullet hell game for mobile and pc.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Januarius Mensis 1st, 2020 Archelian Calendar. Demon-like beings called Abyssals appeared on the skies of Earthland and declared war. With vastly superior technologies, the military might that included floating warships as large as a city, and the power to command Psionic Energy and Particles, humanity stood no chance against their invaders. Conventional weapons had no effect on their defense mechanisms. A nuclear warhead could barely scratch the shields made of these Psion particles that covered all their spaceships. In the end, there was nothing humanity could do. That was, until the appearance...  of the “Valkyries”.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Features : 

- Boss fights!

- Sick musics

- Simple intuitive single handed controls

- Interesting backstory!

- Upgrades, and progression

- 20+ stages to fight in!

- And more!
